Moreover, the broader context is important. Trump's presidency coincided with a rise in anti-Muslim sentiment in some parts of the U.S., and his rhetoric was often seen as fueling that sentiment. In summary, while Trump's motivations might have been framed around security and immigration control, the impact of his policies and rhetoric was to target Muslims, contributing to an environment of Islamophobia.
